text: Talita Nogueira is a Brazilian practitioner and mixed martial artist. Talita Nogueira is most notable for being the 2011 World Jiu-Jitsu Championship winner. Talita Nogueira is currently signed to Bellator. ==Mixed martial arts career== ===Early career=== Prior to signing with Bellator, Nogueira fought exclusively in her native Brazil. Until June 2018 she has 7–1 record. ===Bellator MMA=== Nogueira signed with Bellator in August 2014. Nogueira was expected to make her promotional debut at Bellator 133 against Julia Budd on February 13, 2015. However, Nogueira pulled out of the fight due to a knee injury and was replaced by Gabrielle Holloway. Nogueira was scheduled to face Marloes Coenen at Bellator 163 but the bout was cancelled the day before the event when Talita failed to make weight. Nogueira faced Amanda Bell at Bellator 182 on August 25, 2017. She won the fight via a rear-naked choke submission in the first round. In her first title shot, Nogueira faced Julia Budd on July 13, 2018 at Bellator 202.
